extendedInfo.description: If you like games like 1942, 1943, SWIV, Sky Force, Air Strike, AirAttack, DoDonPachi, Espgaluda, Hybris, Dangar, Space Invaders, Galaga, Raiden, Xenon, R-Type, or Gradius... you will love Battle Squadron !!In 1989 it received an amazing 109% rating... in 2012 this legendary Commodore Amiga shooter finally arrives on on Android !! ** World's first: simultaneous 2-player on tablets !!** Full original version !!MAJOR AWARDS4/5 @ AndroidZoom4.5/5 @ TouchArcade.com 8/10 Xperia Play Silver Award @ Pocket Gamer5/5 @ iPhoneFreak.com "Top App" @ bild.de "App der Woche" @ GamersGlobal.de 5/5 @ iphonegameruk.co.uk 3/4 @ slide to Play 4/5 @ maclife.de 9/10 @ PushStart-------------------------------- GAME VIDEO: http://youtu.be/v22jB0l1osY-------------------------------- WHAT THE PRESS SAYS Android version:"Unique retro gaming experience on Android", www.androidpolice.com"World's first split-screen shooter", www.phandroid.com"A classic in history as it entered the gaming scene", www.bitloaders.com"Grab it TODAY, you wonât be disappointed", Reboot ReviewsiOS version: "A fantastic shooter which beats the vast majority of its modern day equivalents hands down!", www.iphonefreak.com "Battle Squadron ONE is excellent gaming, folks. Do not miss it", www.toucharcade.com "I had a smile on my face a mile wide while I played the game", www.iphonefreak.com "The split screen adaptation of this game is a fabulous addition", AppAdvice.com "Those that love retro shooters will also enjoy this game incredibly", iphonegameruk.co.uk "Can honestly say that Battle Squadron is probably my favorite 2D shooter of them all", www.toucharcade.com Amiga version: 109% - "Now Battle Squadron is the best", Amiga Computing (2:10) 90% - "It's expert execution and addictive playability", Info (31) 87% - "It's rapid-fire animation, coupled with effective sound and a long running music track", The Games Machine (25) 90% - "Battle Squadron is so addictive that you just can't stop playing", The One Amiga (56) GAME STORY Your mission: Earth has been long at war with the evil alien Barrax empire, with extensive losses on both sides. Your two fellow commanders, Mayers and Bergin, have been taken hostage by a Barrax Nova Cruiser and are held hostage on the alien Barrax home world, Planet Terrainia. You must destroy the Barrax home world to rescue your fellow commanders !! MAIN FEATURES - (World Premiere) 2-player split-screen on large screen Android tablets: play with, or against your friends - Several control options, including new 2x direct touch - 4 fantastically detailed levels to fight your way through - Scores of different enemies... watch out for the predator-like ones... - 4 highly diverse "bosses" to defeat- 24 different weapons (4 types of 6 grades each) + Nova Missile- 4 different difficulties ("Squadron Leader" is exactly like on Amiga) - New Ã¼ber-difficulty mode: "Air Commodore"â¦ with surprise ending - Plays on Android 2.1 to 4.x- And loads more... So engage and destroy... "Welcome to Battle Squadron !!"

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Recreates the original experience. This was my favorite Amiga game, and the devs have not disappointed with this conversion. My only concern is the finger tracking seems a little off on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: David Cooney

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Holy crap, yes!  Just how I remember it on Amiga.  Love the music. I had a ringtone before I knew this was released. For years I owned the Genesis version.  Glad to see/hear it again.
reviews.author: ToM MelgaarD

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: Missed this one back in the Amiga days, but wow! Very solid gameplay. Better than most shooters today. Well worth the coin.
reviews.author: John Lawson

reviews.title: The good ol\' game on android
reviews.comment: Great for procrastination ;-)
reviews.author: J\303\270rgen Tietze

reviews.title: This is how all ports should be
reviews.comment: Runs very well even on modest phones, controls very well, new greatly integrated gameplay features. A MUST BUY for shooter fans .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A classic!
reviews.comment: Awesome!
reviews.author: Ignacio G. Zea

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Loved this game first time round on the Amiga. Still fantastic today. An essential purchase for all shoot em up fans!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Retro Amiga-ness on my S2
reviews.comment: From the title music to the in game action, the feel of the Amiga is here. If you love your retro shooters then this great fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must buy for Amiga retro gamers!
reviews.comment: If only other Amiga titles were apps like this. The attention to details like polished control options, music jukebox, display options, achievements, not to mention simultaneous 2 player on tablets make this a delight. Thank you so much for reviving my favorite Amiga shmup! Looking forward to this company (hopefully) doing many more games like this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thats great!
reviews.comment: Never thought that porting an Amiga game to Android may keep the play-ability and atmosphere of original version, but its possible.  They did a excellent job porting Battle Squadron to Android, it plays like a charm. Happily the developers decided to keep the game free of \'In App Purchases\' and Ads, so you really get a full game without limitations for your money. Unfortunately there a some points preventing it being perfect:  - There is no save state. If you exit the game you have to restart the next time you play. Fortunately the game pauses if you switch tasks, so you have to keep the game in background if you want to continue it later. - Please add local high-scores in addition to open feint. I want to  compare my score only with the score of my brother (or my own progress) and not with the hole community and I\'m not always online while playing.  Nevertheless, great game! Btw. Developer answers eMails quite fast, so 5 Stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brings Back Memories
reviews.comment: This is definitely a good shooter and it\'s bringing back memories of the days I still consider to be the golden age of computing.  Even though this is an older game it holds its own with newer shooters and I recommend it for anyone who is a fan of the genre.  The only suggestion I would have would be an in-game volume adjustment. It seems extremely loud compared to other games and I end up having to adjust my phone volume directly which screws up the volume I set it at for everything else. Otherwise it\'s very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Retro makeover outstanding
reviews.comment: Wake up devs, this is how you do old school properly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best shoot\'em up on Android
reviews.comment: A perfect conversion from the Amiga version by the original authors themselves. Really fun to play. Destroy the Barrax empire (again)!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well worth the dollar
reviews.comment: I am an EMT so I spend a lot of time standing and waiting in hospitals. Great time killer. Not all the flash of today\'s modern games but a great back in the day arcade game. Idk how much it usually is but can\'t beat a dollar for this game. I have N.O.V.A. 3 and Modern Combat 3 yet I still end up playing this game most.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This was one of my all time favorite Amiga games and the Android version is great. One of my favorite soundtracks too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Well worth the purchase to relive this Amiga 500 classic game. Great control system and still hard as nails.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be perfect
reviews.comment: The game itself, the port from the Amiga, is superb. But what is around the game is not that great... Why when you are playing the phone vibrates always? You cant save the game to continue later. It is very common for the game to reset your settings. Even when you say no sound, it still does sound here and there. It keeps giving the same achievements over and over again...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Like in 1990
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it,  memories come flooding back.... Now hurry up and get Hybris sorted!!!!! Lol

reviews.comment: Error 941 when trying to install on Cyanogen 10 (Jelly Bean 4.1.1) HTC Sensation. :(
